name: Shibadungeon
description:
Welcome to Shibadungeon!
Shibadungeon is a turn-based dungeon crawler where you can play with friends! The game will remain free throughout its lifetime and I will be continuing to update this game for the foreseeable future. The combat mechanics in shibadungeon makes turn-based battles a bit more interesting then they normally are.
I really hope you enjoy this game!


Features:
- 5 Different Classes (different stats and spells each)
- Interesting turn-based combat
- Dungeons
- Armour and Weapons
- Travelling Merchant
- Online Coop Multiplayer
- Automated Matchmaking
- Save Data
- Pretty good music
- Exp and Levels
- a lot more to come!
